name: Heartbroken (Gargantus)
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Heartbroken is a bullet hell action game where you control two characters - a knight and his soul. The knight can attack and is invincible but slower and the heart is vulnerable but faster. Try to maneuver your way through enemies and get to the end of the dungeon.

Controls:
WASD - Move knight
Arrows - Move heart
Space - Attack

Credits:
Art and code done by me

Music done by HeatleyBros
https://www.audiomicro.com/artist/heatleybros
